data.message: Since y'all haven't responded to my messages, but it seems y'all are quick to respond here...Can you tell me why on earth y'all wan't me to upload a copy of my ID to prove my profile name is what my friends call me? I thought this was a social media site? #MyFriendsCallMeAriUnwritten

replies.message: Hi Ari. We require everyone using Facebook to use their authentic name and it sounds like we might be trying to confirm your identity. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2e19yJf. -Hannah

Facebook Sounds like that because that's exactly what you're trying to do. That's not an answer hun. 1. This name is what ALL my friends call me. 2. Why would a free social media site want a copy of my id? 3. Why does it even matter....this is a social media site!!! I need real answers because this has happened to far too many people. Especially black and brown people, and those involved in aspects of social justice. I need something better than that

Facebook plus I know SEVERAL people who don't use their real names and aren't bothered. If what you'tr saying is true then shouldn't everyone have to upload their id? Or just the people you pick who look suspicious? I'm just trying to figure out how any of this is fair
Maybe facebook is trying to protect our Identity and private information!!! I am grateful for that, as I have had several issues with stalker on another site.
Madeleine Bryant-Kambe  i am protect my information when i give my nickname
Madeleine Bryant-Kambe HOW THE HELL IS ME NOT WANTEING TO GIVE MY REAL NAME ENDANGERING MY SECURITY? I would think using a nick name would help keep my actual information secure
And still no response from @facebook
Facebook  i have a problem with someone posting to my deceased friends site ,do they have to show id??
posting as if they were him that is! from his home page
Ban Facebook Security :D :P

Facebook good morning, facebook! here is my now daily request for clarification on what happens to those of us who are unable to install apps on our smartphones when you discontinue the mobile messaging site. Looking forward to your response.
I was locked out of my account for 18months -_-

..it must be like twitter.. there must not be something wrong of using nicknames or just invented name coz its their Privacy. however if facebook is just going to ask a lot of information especially in ID. eventually, there might be a possible problem in the end which others have been experiencing too.. i dont know what kind of issue they have gone through in FB. but still, Fb process must be a fair communication for everyone. security? what kind of security would people have in Fb if a lot of infos have already given.. people have their brains.to secure themselves on their own.. but only facebook makes them insecure .. lol
i agreed with Janu Yaar
Facebook why are you not responding to me

Hi ari if you want to protect your self don't use other name 
Just use bulletproof....
Lovingly yours hhmuaaahhh

I had to send my Driver`s License to Facebook to prove my identity. Facebook also blocked my account for a day at the time. I don`t know if someone reported me, or if it was because I had too many groups or what the problem was. But I sent it and got everything cleared up and Facebook reopened my account. Never did find out why they had to see my ID. There is tons of people not using their real name and also have fake accounts trolling and have multiple ccounts. Facebook since you have checked me can my profile be marked verified?
Daniel Tony Espino
Daniel Espino Tomanelli Team mobile
This is a FB account... Not a Bank account..
